text: British Midland Regional Limited known as bmi regional was a British regional airline that runs timetabled passenger services mostly within the UK. Its head office is in Aberdeen Airport East in Dyce, Aberdeen, Scotland."General Conditions of Carriage ." British Midland. Retrieved on 28 December 2011. "British Midland Regional Ltd Registered Office Aberdeen Airport East Wellheads Drive Dyce Aberdeen AB21 7EU" Its main base is Aberdeen Airport."." British Midland International. 20 December 2005. Retrieved on 28 December 2011. BMI Regional was owned by British Midland International until 2012. Sector Aviation Holdings Limited bought BMI Regional in May 2012. ==References== Category:Airlines of the United Kingdom Category:1987 establishments in the United Kingdom
title: BMI Regional
